keyMoments.title: Shadow Abilities Transfer Completely
keyMoments.description: Jigoro demonstrates that implanting a shadow into a zombie transfers not just the original person's strength, but their complete fighting techniques and some personality traits.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the true extent and horror of the Kage Kage no Mi's power - victims lose their shadows and their abilities are weaponized against them.

keyMoments.title: General Zombies System Explained
keyMoments.description: The episode reveals how Moria creates General Zombies by combining legendary warriors' corpses with shadows from powerful living individuals, creating elite undead soldiers.
keyMoments.significance: Explains the strategic application of the Kage Kage no Mi's power in creating a powerful army.

abilities.description: The user can extract and manipulate the shadows of living beings. Those who lose their shadow will be vaporized if exposed to sunlight.
Extracted shadows can be implanted into corpses to create zombies. The zombie gains the fighting abilities, techniques, and some personality traits of the shadow's original owner.
When a shadow is implanted into a zombie, all of the original person's combat skills, techniques, and fighting instincts transfer completely, as demonstrated by Jigoro using Zoro's sword techniques.

weaknesses.description: Salt can purify zombies created with this power, forcing the shadow out of the body and returning it to its original owner.
The user cannot swim and is weakened by seawater and Seastone.
